overview: Max Burton is the Executive Creative Director at frog, based in San Francisco. For nearly twenty years, Max has worked in all areas of product design, from physical to interaction and experience design. He has a post graduate degree in design from the Royal College of Art. Max’s work has been exhibited at the Museum of Modern Art in New York and the Design Museum in London. He holds a dozen utility patents and more than thirty design patents. He is also a fellow of the Charted Society of Designers and a member of the Industrial Designers’ Society of America.
